title: Shopee: Robot Shopping System
description: A multi-robot autonomous shopping system where robots navigate shelves, pick items, and deliver them. Features ROS2 architecture, FSM-based coordination, and central server management.

title: Roomie: Hotel Delivery Robot
description: Autonomous hotel service robot with inter-floor navigation using robot arm for elevator control. Features YOLOv8n vision for obstacle and glass door detection. Achieved 95% button recognition accuracy with YOLO+CNN pipeline.

title: FALCON: Airport Safety AI
description: Real-time bird strike and FOD detection using Blender/Unity synthetic data. Features collision risk calculation and LLM-based pilot voice Q&A.

title: Bikecast: Demand Forecasting
description: Bike-sharing demand forecasting analyzing 44M trip records with XGBoost. Optimized query performance from hours to tens of seconds using indexing.

title: DUST: Smart Logistics Control
description: RFID-based IoT platform for integrated control of AGVs, conveyors, and gates. Improved response speed 3x using binary protocol.

title: Minecraft with ROS2 & SLAM
description: A robotics experiment integrating Minecraft with ROS 2. Controls the game character using a physical joystick via micro-ROS and performs real-time SLAM mapping.
